description: This source file defines API endpoints for managing ride operations in a bike taxi booking system using FastAPI. It includes functionalities such as booking rides, accepting, starting, completing, canceling, and listing rides. The file sets up API routes, handles role-based access control, and interacts with ride and driver data models.

methods.name: float _estimate_fare(pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)
methods.description: Calculates a simple distance-based fare estimate between pickup and dropoff locations.

methods.name: book_ride(body: RideRequest, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for passengers to book a new ride, generating a fare estimate.

methods.name: accept_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for drivers to accept an available ride, changing its status to accepted.

methods.name: start_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for drivers to start a ride after acceptance, updating the ride status.

methods.name: complete_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for drivers to mark a ride as completed, finalizing the fare.

methods.name: cancel_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for passengers to cancel a ride before it has started.

methods.name: list_my_rides(user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for passengers to list their ride history.

methods.name: get_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Endpoint for retrieving details of a specific ride.

ctags.name: _estimate_fare
ctags.pattern: /^def _estimate_fare(pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)/
ctags.signature: (pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)
